articles.title: Jeff Bezos Lost More Money Than Adani And Ambani Put Together: Report - NDTV
articles.description: According to the 2023 M3M Hurun Global Rich List, American billionaire Jeff Bezos lost the most money over the past year.
articles.content:
US billionaire Jeff Bezos lost $70 billion in personal wealth.
Jeff Bezos, the founder of the global online retailer Amazon, saw the biggest loss in wealth in terms of dollars in the past year, acco… [+1674 chars]

articles.title: The Messi of maths: Argentinian Luis Caffarelli wins Abel prize - The Guardian
articles.description: Caffarelli, 74, takes top trophy for work on partial differential equations, the first winner from South America
articles.content:
First football, and now maths. Three months after Lionel Messi triumphed at the World Cup, an Argentinian has won the top international trophy in mathematics.
